Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

In this candid conversation, she opens up to Dini Petty about her creative process, overcoming hardship, and a decade of sobriety that shaped her art and her voice.

programme.title: Camp Woodward
programme.desc: For most children, summer camp is a time of singing songs by the fire, creating gimp bracelets in arts and crafts, and munching on s'mores. For a special breed of camper, however, it's the season for practicing a 180 G-Turn or mastering a 50/50 grind. "Camp Woodward" follows young daredevils-in-training into the Pennsylvania Dutch countryside, where action-sports counselors and visiting guest professionals help turn these skateboarding and BMX students into the Tony Hawks and Ryan Nyquists of tomorrow.

programme.desc: Highlights of the 2015 Dew Tour event, that took place at Chicago and Los Angeles with the amazing winning runs by Kelvin Hoefler, Jimmy Wilkins and many more.

programme.title: Do Rad Stuff: My Bikini Trip with the Rip Curl Women's Team
programme.desc: Do Rad Stuff is a fun trip from Rip Curl's women's team through Bali. The surfers show us where we can catch amazing waves in one of the most beautiful spots on the planet.

programme.title: Bubba's World
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes access to supercross champion James "Bubba" Stewart.

What begins as Buster's dream of big-time success soon becomes an emotional reminder of the power of music to heal even the most broken heart.

programme.desc: Tag joins for Thanksgiving dinner; Joey may have ruined Rachel's chances with Tag when he opens his mouth during dinner; Phoebe reveals that she has been secretly keeping a dog in her room for a few days while its owner is away.

programme.desc: Rachel finds it embarrassing that she is paying the way for her hunky new boyfriend (Eddie Cahill), who is also her assistant at work.

programme.desc: The weight of winning a Nobel Prize weighs heavy on Amy's shoulders; Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to relive the good old days after Wolowitz buys a scooter that looks like the one he had years ago.

programme.desc: Joey accidentally informs a cast member (Susan Sarandon) that she will be fired so that his character will get her character's brain.

programme.desc: Unexpectedly stuck in Seattle, Phil figures out how to be at Alex's graduation party via video chat and a robotic vessel; Claire worries about giving Alex the perfect gift; Mitch doesn't tell Cam about being laid off.

programme.desc: Haley and Andy deal with their emotions in different ways; finding a preschool for Joe is more difficult than Jay and Gloria anticipated; when money gets tight, Cam wants Mitch to return to his former job.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Harvey
programme.desc: (1950) Classic comedy with James Stewart and Josephine Hull. A middle-aged eccentric insists his best friend is a six-foot invisible rabbit. And that's driving his sister to distraction.

programme.title: The Seventh Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1958) Fantasy adventure. When Sinbad's fiancée is shrunk by an evil magician, he must overcome a series of daunting adversaries and obstacles to restore her. Effects by Ray Harryhausen.

programme.title: Rosaline
programme.desc: (2022) Literary romcom with Kaitlyn Dever and Isabela Merced. This is the story of Juliet's cousin who gets dumped by Romeo at the start of Shakespeare's play... and she's not too pleased.

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: (1997) Comedy sequel starring Alex D. Linz as a resourceful boy who's stranded at home with chickenpox when a top-secret military microchip comes his way. Can he keep it safe from crooks?

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: (2017) Fantasy adventure sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black. Four teenagers are sucked into the Jumanji video game to complete a dangerous quest.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: (2015) Part five of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The secret agents must bring down a terrorist group, but that's not easy when the CIA are hunting you down...

programme.title: How to Blow Up a Pipeline
programme.desc: (2022) High-octane eco-thriller. A disparate group of young Americans unite to disrupt the oil industry in an act motivated by everything from the ideological to the downright personal.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Getting Personal
programme.desc: Deepa meets Mary Whittaker to find out how she became Scotland's first deaf BSL minister.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dancing at Lughnasa
programme.desc: (1997) Drama. Meryl Streep stars in this tale of five sisters in rural 1930s Ireland whose lives are disrupted when their ageing missionary brother returns from Africa. With Michael Gambon.

programme.title: Fighting with my Family...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Florence Pugh, Jack Lowden, Nick Frost and director Stephen Merchant discuss making the comedy-drama that's based on a real-life family of wrestlers from Norwich.

programme.title: The Bravados
programme.desc: (1958) Brooding western starring Joan Collins and Gregory Peck. A man hunts down the four escaped prisoners who he believes are responsible for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: Winchester '73
programme.desc: (1950) Western. James Stewart stars as sharpshooter Lin McAdam, who wins a Winchester rifle. But a murderous rival steals his prize, so McAdam sets out on an epic journey in pursuit.

programme.title: Guadalcanal Diary
programme.desc: (1943) Second World War action drama following two US marines as they make advances into the Solomon Islands to drive back the Japanese forces. Starring Preston Foster and Lloyd Nolan.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: (2022) Action thriller with Chris Pine. An ex-soldier takes on private work to feed his family, but finds himself in dire straits (danger; not the band). With Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: Les Misérables
programme.desc: (2019) Ladj Ly's oscar-nominated drama, loosely based on his childhood and set in the struggling Parisian suburbs of Montfermeil during the 2018 riots. In French/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: (1954) Western. Van Johnson stars as a Confederate agent who steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees and attempts to smuggle it south through enemy lines to his own side.

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: (1971) Vanessa Redgrave stars in a dramatisation of the life of the 16th-century Scottish queen. Glenda Jackson co-stars as her cousin and rival, England's Queen Elizabeth I. Violence.

programme.title: Robin and Marian
programme.desc: (1976) Touching romance starring Sean Connery and Audrey Hepburn. The ageing legend Robin Hood returns to Sherwood Forest and discovers that, while he was away, Marian has become an Abbess.

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: (1957) Second World War thriller. Robert Mitchum stars as the captain of a US destroyer in the North Atlantic hunting down a German U-boat and its world-weary captain, Curt Jurgens.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: (1997) Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet star in James Cameron's Oscar-winning epic. Lovers from across the social divide meet on the doomed luxury liner.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: (1992) Stephen Rea plays an ex-IRA terrorist who's pursued by a deadly assassin, Miranda Richardson, to London, where a love affair complicates matters. Very strong language/violence.

programme.title: The Principles of Lust
programme.desc: (2003) Drama starring Alec Newman. A man must choose between his stable relationship and his thrill-seeking friends. Strong violence/very strong language/graphic sex/drugs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: (1951) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a rancher who's the target of unwelcome harassment by his richer and more powerful neighbour. With Alexander Knox, Joan Leslie and Ellen Drew.

programme.title: This Gun for Hire
programme.desc: (1942) Classic noir starring Alan Ladd and Veronica Lake. As a cold-blooded assassin seek vengeance for a double cross, he unwisely falls for the girlfriend of the cop who's pursuing him.

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: (1968) Epic Second World War drama starring Robert Mitchum. A reporter gets trapped behind enemy lines during the costly 1944 Allied invasion of Italy. With Peter Falk and Robert Ryan.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Van Heflin stars as a veteran frontiersman whose determination to mould his sons in his gun-totin' image backfires disastrously. With Tab Hunter and James Darren.

programme.title: Fighting with my Family...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Florence Pugh, Jack Lowden, Nick Frost and director Stephen Merchant discuss making the comedy-drama that's based on a real-life family of wrestlers from Norwich.

programme.title: The Eagle
programme.desc: (2010) Historical adventure with Channing Tatum and Jamie Bell. A Roman commander and his British slave embark on a risky mission to recover a military mascot lost in Scotland.

programme.title: Polite Society
programme.desc: (2023) Nida Manzoor's kick-ass martial-arts anti-romcom stars Priya Kansara as a college student and wannabe stuntwoman who wants to save her older sister from an undesirable marriage.

programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: (2002) Action thriller starring Vin Diesel as Xander Cage: a thrill-seeking extreme sports enthusiast, stuntman and rebellious athlete-turned-reluctant spy. With Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: xXx: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2005) Action thriller sequel with Samuel L Jackson, Ice Cube and Willem Dafoe. There's a new Triple X agent in town and he's up against some shady government business.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: (1954) Western with Robert Mitchum and Marilyn Monroe. An ex-con and a saloon singer steer a raft through hostile territory to face a showdown with her crooked fiancé. With Rory Calhoun.

programme.title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
programme.desc: (1959) Comedy western with Kenneth More. An English gunsmith decides the Wild West is the best market for his wares, but little does he expect to end up sheriff of a lawless frontier town.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: (1951) Drama. James Mason stars in Henry Hathaway's sympathetic portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel in the final years of his life during the Second World War. With Jessica Tandy.

programme.title: Tobruk
programme.desc: (1967) World War II thriller. George Peppard, Rock Hudson and Nigel Green lead a daring Allied raid to destroy Nazi fuel dumps in North Africa.

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: (2004) Drama. Dennis Quaid stars as the captain of an aircraft downed in the desert. There's no hope of rescue, unless he and the survivors can build another plane from the wreckage.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: (2017) Fantasy adventure starring Matt Damon and Willem Dafoe. In 11th-century China, Europeans seeking the secret of gunpowder are caught up in a war against alien monsters.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: (1992) Action adventure starring Daniel Day-Lewis and Madeleine Stowe. Can a frontiersman protect two British women from the brutality of the 18th-century American colonial wars?

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: (2019) Keanu Reeves returns for the third time as the supposedly retired hitman. Someone's put a contract on John Wick's head and only a mystic in Morocco can lift it.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E14 The Gaucho Curge Palmer is upset after Argentinian Juan Argentez bought a ranch he wanted. Palmer insults Argentez and his children, Nita and Manolo. Meanwhile, Manolo's anger over who is courting Nita gets him into trouble when her suitor is found dead.

programme.title: The Young Land
programme.desc: When an American gunslinger kills a Mexican man in California immediately in the aftermath of the Mexican-American War, he is arrested and put on trial for murder. The local population is anxious to see if justice will prevail.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E31 Outlaw's Shoes Lucas rides to a nearby town to see the gunsmith to get a new spring for his rifle. On the way, two gunmen ambush Lucas, knocking him unconscious. When Lucas awakens, he has amnesia and thinks he is one of the outlaws, George Vale, who is wanted.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E3 Bye, Bye, Balloon Captain Parmenter receives an urgent message that Prussian Colonel Heindrich von Zeppel is arriving to train the men of F Troop as balloonists in warfare. Agarn is skeptical but O'Rourke sees an opportunity to make a profit.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E4 Reach for the Sky, Pardner F Troop becomes a victim of a payroll robbery when bandits rob a train carrying Fort Courage's money. To protect the next payroll train, Agarn and O'Rourke volunteer to guard the payload. Impending danger awaits as the bandits are known killers.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E11 Fall from Grace After Jimmy has an argument with Teaspoon, he quits the Pony Express and begins working for hired gunmen led by Grace, the owner of the local saloon. However, he learns that the outlaws are planning to rob the Army of guns and ammunition.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E12 Hard Time The Kid tries to help a woman in the corrupt small town of Prosperity but, while there, he finds himself in trouble with the law. When the sheriff sentences The Kid to hard labor, the riders suspect something is not quite right, and come to his aid.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, two men have their getaway plan go wrong. When one bandit takes their one remaining horse and rides off with the gold, the other is captured. Years later, the two men face off in a deadly game of deceit and revenge.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E11 Quicksand In order to help a wagon load of traveling settlers in need of rescue and supplies, Cheyenne fights to show his courage against an Indian chief in a pit of swallowing sand. The first one to yell for help loses the fight.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: On this episode of The Cowboy Way, the road trip concludes as the cowboys learn how to round up cattle Louisiana-style. The guys jump into airboats and dodge gators to move a herd out of a marsh. Back home, Cody brings the boys to the Montgomery History Museum to do some family research, and discovers Bubba shares the same last name as Booger's mother! Are Booger and Bubba...related? When Jaclyn signs Matthew up for tee-ball, Booger jumps in to coach - and discovers it's probably easier herding cattle than 4-year olds. Kaley and Bubba get the whole gang together for a much-needed day of family fun at the lake.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a high-flying episode of The Cowboy Way. Misty surprises Cody with the gift of a thrilling ride on an aerobatic glider - only problem is, Cody is terrified of heights! Back on solid ground, some of the herd escapes into a neighboring trailer park. Can the guys wrangle them in before they do any real damage? Jaclyn starts the search for a new family home, but a rough dirt-road stands between them and their dream house. And it's down to the wire for the cowboys' cattle deal as the guys try to find a buyer before their million-dollar herd runs out of grass.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E18 The Photographer Abel Goss is doing a portrait of Mark standing on a North Fork street. Suddenly he sees Colonel Whiteside and his sidekick, Jamison. When he recognizes them as the cruel men who tortured him in a Civil War prison camp, problems soon arise.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E19 Shivaree A young couple traveling to Yuma to get married come across Aaron Pelser's wagon train. Pelser and his group take things too far by forcing them to marry in North Fork, which is not the friendly spirit for a shivaree. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: Miraculously still alive after his hanging, an aging gunfighter defends a young widow's farm from a vicious land grabber while confronting his troubled past.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron awaits the return of his daughter from school and is surprised that his wife has returned to take their daughter away. He tries to keep the peace and do what is best for everyone.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E2 The Conspirators Cheyenne travels to Washington, DC, to work on a special undercover assignment for the Army. He poses as a traveling stage actor named Jim Merritt in order to stop the Confederate Army's reorganization.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E3 The Mutton Puncher An attractive businesswoman named Thora Flagg needs help to move her herd of sheep into town. However, cattle boss Ben Creed, who is Cheyenne's boss, stands in the way. During a poker game, Cheyenne finds himself caught in the middle.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E15 The Courtship Joe and Hoss travel to Sacramento to visit Helen, the widow of Ben's friend, Josh Layton. Hoss falls in love with her and intends to marry her. All are thrilled except Adam, who has reason to believe that she is using Hoss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E25 None So Blind Mark befriends Lafayette Blye, a blind banjo-playing man. Blye tells Mark he's hunting the man responsible for his blindness. Meanwhile, veterinarian John J. Mack tells Lucas he needs to destroy his herd. It turns out Mack is the man Blye is seeking.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E26 Jealous Man Micah's friends, Jake Owens, and his pretty wife, Fay, are Lucas' new neighbors. Jake is wildly jealous of Fay and wrongly imagines Lucas and Fay are having a romance. Jake soon threatens to kill Lucas, which almost leads to his own death instead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E27 Guilty Conscience As soon as aging Leota Carraway and her teenage son, Hab, arrive in North Fork, they see Marshal Micah Torrance, who she takes as her long-lost husband who abandoned her 16 years ago. Lucas investigates and finds a gambler who looks just like Micah.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E28 Day of Reckoning North Fork welcomes new minister, Reverand Jamison, Lucas' enemy and a gunslinger who forced people off their land 25 years ago. Lucas soon realizes Jamison has reformed, but still faces danger from his past.

programme.desc: S4 E28 Day of Reckoning North Fork welcomes new minister, Reverand Jamison, Lucas' enemy and a gunslinger who forced people off their land 25 years ago. Lucas soon realizes Jamison has reformed, but still faces danger from his past.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E9 Done Deal Bubba, Cody and Booger close their biggest cattle deal ever on The Cowboy Way! The million-dollar herd is ready to ship, but moving all that cattle into trucks becomes a race against the clock for their much-needed final paycheck. The cowboys help a woman remove cattle from her family's land when she is forced to sell the property after the passing of her parents. Having been through a similar situation, Booger is inspired to fix-up his family's old homestead as a special surprise for his grandma. Cody's book is finally finished, but as Misty plans the book-signing event, a missed shipment could derail the whole party. The Cattlemen's Association invites the guys to their annual ball, with a very special honor in store.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a special Christmas Episode of The Cowboy Way. The holidays are always hectic, but for cowboys it's especially busy because it's also calving season. Time for the birth of new baby calves to join the herd. Bubba, Cody, and Booger must monitor their heifers around the clock and still find time to shop for gifts, decorate for Christmas, and enjoy time with their families. Booger helps Matthew pick out an extra-special gift to top Grandma's Christmas tree. Cody looks to buy Carter the perfect cute new puppy. Kaley enlists the wives to help prepare for the Thompson's annual holiday party. But, when a heifer who's in labor goes missing one night, the cowboys frantically search for her while trying to keep from missing the big event.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E20 The Deadeye Kid After witnessing a murder, 16 year-old Donnel O'Mahoney panics and comes to the McCain Ranch. A posse is on the hunt for the young man, believing he commited the crime. Mark befriends and hides O'Mahoney, who is traveling west from New York.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E12 Wilton the Kid A gunman known as Kid Vicious, who looks exactly like Captain Wilton Parmenter, arrives at Fort Courage. Wrangler Jane initially thinks he is the captain but after he terrorizes the F Troop, Parmenter shows his leadership and confronts the intruder.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E13 The Return of Wrongo Starr The jinxed cavalryman, Wrongo Starr, comes back to Fort Courage. However, this time he is making the F Troop very nervous with a load of dynamite in his possession. While there, he gets mixed up with a goat after Parmenter assigns him as a guard.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E7 Wild Bill Hickok & the First Quick-Draw Duel Wild Bill Hickok and his buddy, Davis Tutt, see their friendship fall apart over gambling debts and the affections of a beautiful woman. After Tutt swipes Wild Bill's prized timepiece as payback for a disputed debt, things begin to heat up. Then, when Tutt parades through town with the watch in one hand and Hickok's former girlfriend in the other, Wild Bill's blood begins to boil. Tutt refuses to return the watch, and he continues to flaunt the beautiful woman on his arm. The two men meet in the middle of town to settle their differences once and for all in what will become the very first quick-draw duel of the Old West. Both men reach for their pistols at the same time and fire! In an attempt to separate the truth from the fiction, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews George Ward Nichols, the journalist who immortalized the duel and created the legend of Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E8 Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy's arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E4 Lewis & Clark: Captains of Discovery Under orders from President Jefferson to explore America's vast unknown frontier, Meriwether Lewis and William Clark lead an expedition up the Missouri River in an attempt to reach the Pacific Ocean...a journey no American has made before, and one that may not even be possible. Leaving Fort Mandan after their first winter on the frontier, the Corps of Discovery enters completely uncharted territory. But as the waterways they travel become too shallow for boats, Lewis and Clark desperately seek the Shoshone tribe and their horses. To communicate with the elusive tribe, they rely on Sacagawea, a 16-year-old Shoshone woman, who accompanies the expedition with her newborn son. Lewis and Clark hope Sacagawea will help them trade for the Shoshone's horses, which will provide the only means of crossing the forbidding Rocky Mountains before winter returns.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E17 Old Scores Convinced that he has seen one of the men responsible for the murder of his family, Ike seeks revenge. However, the suspect is now a family man himself. Meanwhile, the riders investigate reports of a mysterious beast in the area.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E4 Border Affair During the French occupation in Mexico, Cheyenne meets a beautiful princess who is engaged to marry an older French officer. He takes her to a rebel camp, where he learns her true identity.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E5 Devil's Canyon Cheyenne leads a group of ruthless fortune hunters on a dangerous search for buried diamonds. Murder and mystery abound during the group's quest for hidden treasure especially when Cheyenne discovers someone is following them.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Spitfire Joe finds a man burning Ponderosa land and shoots him in self-defense. Joe is left with the responsibility of the man's daughter. He brings her to the Ponderosa, unaware of her outlaw kin searching for her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E29 The Day a Town Slept Lucas and Mark return to North Fork after a hunting trip to discover Marshal Micah Torrance has been voted out. Smooth-talking newcomer Ben Judson is now in charge and his friendship with a wanted outlaw has Lucas suspicious.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E30 Milly's Brother Harry Chase moves to North Fork and courts Milly Scott, the owner of the general store. He impresses her with his heroic Civil War stories and claims he knew her brother who was killed in action. Lucas is suspicious and suspects he is a fraud.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E31 Outlaw's Shoes Lucas rides to a nearby town to see the gunsmith to get a new spring for his rifle. On the way, two gunmen ambush Lucas, knocking him unconscious. When Lucas awakens, he has amnesia and thinks he is one of the outlaws, George Vale, who is wanted.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E32 The Executioner Russell Ganaway, a former neighbor of Lucas', is released from prison and asks for a job on the McCain Ranch. Years ago, Ganaway was found guilty of a robbing a stage and the money was never found. Lucas agrees but soon realizes he's hiding a secret.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E9 Done Deal Bubba, Cody and Booger close their biggest cattle deal ever on The Cowboy Way! The million-dollar herd is ready to ship, but moving all that cattle into trucks becomes a race against the clock for their much-needed final paycheck. The cowboys help a woman remove cattle from her family's land when she is forced to sell the property after the passing of her parents. Having been through a similar situation, Booger is inspired to fix-up his family's old homestead as a special surprise for his grandma. Cody's book is finally finished, but as Misty plans the book-signing event, a missed shipment could derail the whole party. The Cattlemen's Association invites the guys to their annual ball, with a very special honor in store.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a special Christmas Episode of The Cowboy Way. The holidays are always hectic, but for cowboys it's especially busy because it's also calving season. Time for the birth of new baby calves to join the herd. Bubba, Cody, and Booger must monitor their heifers around the clock and still find time to shop for gifts, decorate for Christmas, and enjoy time with their families. Booger helps Matthew pick out an extra-special gift to top Grandma's Christmas tree. Cody looks to buy Carter the perfect cute new puppy. Kaley enlists the wives to help prepare for the Thompson's annual holiday party. But, when a heifer who's in labor goes missing one night, the cowboys frantically search for her while trying to keep from missing the big event.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E20 The Deadeye Kid After witnessing a murder, 16 year-old Donnel O'Mahoney panics and comes to the McCain Ranch. A posse is on the hunt for the young man, believing he commited the crime. Mark befriends and hides O'Mahoney, who is traveling west from New York.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E12 Wilton the Kid A gunman known as Kid Vicious, who looks exactly like Captain Wilton Parmenter, arrives at Fort Courage. Wrangler Jane initially thinks he is the captain but after he terrorizes the F Troop, Parmenter shows his leadership and confronts the intruder.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E13 The Return of Wrongo Starr The jinxed cavalryman, Wrongo Starr, comes back to Fort Courage. However, this time he is making the F Troop very nervous with a load of dynamite in his possession. While there, he gets mixed up with a goat after Parmenter assigns him as a guard.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E7 Wild Bill Hickok & the First Quick-Draw Duel Wild Bill Hickok and his buddy, Davis Tutt, see their friendship fall apart over gambling debts and the affections of a beautiful woman. After Tutt swipes Wild Bill's prized timepiece as payback for a disputed debt, things begin to heat up. Then, when Tutt parades through town with the watch in one hand and Hickok's former girlfriend in the other, Wild Bill's blood begins to boil. Tutt refuses to return the watch, and he continues to flaunt the beautiful woman on his arm. The two men meet in the middle of town to settle their differences once and for all in what will become the very first quick-draw duel of the Old West. Both men reach for their pistols at the same time and fire! In an attempt to separate the truth from the fiction, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews George Ward Nichols, the journalist who immortalized the duel and created the legend of Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E8 Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy's arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E4 Lewis & Clark: Captains of Discovery Under orders from President Jefferson to explore America's vast unknown frontier, Meriwether Lewis and William Clark lead an expedition up the Missouri River in an attempt to reach the Pacific Ocean...a journey no American has made before, and one that may not even be possible. Leaving Fort Mandan after their first winter on the frontier, the Corps of Discovery enters completely uncharted territory. But as the waterways they travel become too shallow for boats, Lewis and Clark desperately seek the Shoshone tribe and their horses. To communicate with the elusive tribe, they rely on Sacagawea, a 16-year-old Shoshone woman, who accompanies the expedition with her newborn son. Lewis and Clark hope Sacagawea will help them trade for the Shoshone's horses, which will provide the only means of crossing the forbidding Rocky Mountains before winter returns.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E17 Old Scores Convinced that he has seen one of the men responsible for the murder of his family, Ike seeks revenge. However, the suspect is now a family man himself. Meanwhile, the riders investigate reports of a mysterious beast in the area.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E4 Border Affair During the French occupation in Mexico, Cheyenne meets a beautiful princess who is engaged to marry an older French officer. He takes her to a rebel camp, where he learns her true identity.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E5 Devil's Canyon Cheyenne leads a group of ruthless fortune hunters on a dangerous search for buried diamonds. Murder and mystery abound during the group's quest for hidden treasure especially when Cheyenne discovers someone is following them.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Spitfire Joe finds a man burning Ponderosa land and shoots him in self-defense. Joe is left with the responsibility of the man's daughter. He brings her to the Ponderosa, unaware of her outlaw kin searching for her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E29 The Day a Town Slept Lucas and Mark return to North Fork after a hunting trip to discover Marshal Micah Torrance has been voted out. Smooth-talking newcomer Ben Judson is now in charge and his friendship with a wanted outlaw has Lucas suspicious.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E30 Milly's Brother Harry Chase moves to North Fork and courts Milly Scott, the owner of the general store. He impresses her with his heroic Civil War stories and claims he knew her brother who was killed in action. Lucas is suspicious and suspects he is a fraud.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E31 Outlaw's Shoes Lucas rides to a nearby town to see the gunsmith to get a new spring for his rifle. On the way, two gunmen ambush Lucas, knocking him unconscious. When Lucas awakens, he has amnesia and thinks he is one of the outlaws, George Vale, who is wanted.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E32 The Executioner Russell Ganaway, a former neighbor of Lucas', is released from prison and asks for a job on the McCain Ranch. Years ago, Ganaway was found guilty of a robbing a stage and the money was never found. Lucas agrees but soon realizes he's hiding a secret.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E1 Go Big or Go Broker Tough jobs and shady business deals force the cowboys to work smarter, not harder. A local rancher asks the guys to remove an ornery bull from his property, but this one is as bullheaded as they come - and takes longer than expected. Tired of scrapping for day wages, the cowboys decide to put their hard-earned experience to use: instead of working cattle for others, they'll start brokering herds themselves. After sifting through his grandmother's old photos, Booger reconnects with his past, then looks to the future by passing on the cowboy way to four-year-old Matthew. While Bubba confides in Kaley that the cowboys are reevaluating their business, Cody gets bad news about his upcoming rodeo, which is even worse news for his bank account.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E2 Don't Mess with Texas The cowboys head to Texas! A simple wrangling job leads to the perfect cattle trading opportunity. The guys plot a course for Texas to capitalize on a buyer's market. Cody forgets his saddle on a routine roundup, and the only thing sorer than his backside is his ego when Booger and Bubba don't let him live down his mistake. After months of searching, Jaclyn and Booger finally find a piece of land perfect for settling down. But can they pull the trigger on the property before someone else swoops in? Bubba gets in hot water with Kaley when he tells Andrew, a long-term friend and ranch hand, that he can crash at their place - but without asking her first. Still licking his wounds from a double-cross, Cody weighs the pros and cons of holding his own rodeo. As their wives juggle life back home, the cowboys hit the road to broker their first big deal. They hope to find the crossbred cattle their buyer is looking for in the Lone Star State.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E22 The Boarding House Julia Andueza opens a boarding house in North Fork. Lucas remembers her as a dishonest card dealer from the past. Her old boss arrives and tries to bully Julia into turning her business into a gambling house. Lucas realizes she has changed her ways.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E14 Survival of the Fittest An army captain arrives at Fort Courage and tells Captain Permenter that two troops must undergo a survival test in the wilderness. Parmenter decides to go with Agarn. Realizing they must survive on their own, the two face challenges finding food.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E15 Bring on the Dancing Girls A new saloon owner named Dan Lawson takes over O'Rourke and Agarn's business. He quickly raises prices and adds a cover charge, angering the regular patrons. Lawson adds new entertainment with dancing can-can girls creating quite the spectacle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca's courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy's friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Hunt for Outlaw Bill Doolin When notorious outlaw Bill Doolin escapes from jail, the U.S. Marshals Service springs into action to end his four-year crime spree. Known as the Three Guardsmen, Deputy U.S. Marshals Heck Thomas, Bill Tilghman, and Chris Madsen have a reputation for always getting their man, but they know it won't be easy with Doolin. Doolin is no ordinary outlaw: as a former member of The Dalton Gang and the mastermind of The Wild Bunch, he has successfully robbed banks, trains, and stagecoaches. After months of tracking Doolin, Heck Thomas is so close he barely stops to eat or sleep. When Thomas and his posse finally corner Doolin, he refuses to surrender, and gunfire is the only way out. Some years later, Bat Masterson, former-gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, catches up with Bill Tilghman to hear the real story behind the hunt for the outlaw Bill Doolin.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E1 John Colter: King of the Mountain Men As a member of Lewis and Clark's Corps of Discovery, John Colter travels from the Missouri River all the way to the Pacific Ocean, but he decides not to return to the civilized East when the expedition ends. Entranced by the beauty and adventure of the wild frontier, he becomes one of America's first mountain men. As a hunter, trapper and explorer in his own right, he's the first American to see the Grand Tetons and the epic Yellowstone Valley. While his epic explorations make him famous, it's a harrowing ordeal with Blackfeet warriors that makes him a legend. After boldly venturing into territory controlled by the Blackfeet tribe, Colter is captured, stripped naked, and forced to run for his life as warriors give chase in what will come to be known as Colter's Run.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Talisman After a priest contacts Teaspoon for help, he takes the riders on a mission to save a village of farmers being terrorized by ruthless bandits who want their silver. Meanwhile, Buck helps protect a woman from a man that has an infatuation with her.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E6 Town of Fear Cheyenne delivers a bank robber to his friend Sheriff Sam Townley. Soon afterward, the townspeople accuse Townley of accidentally shooting a popular farmer's son and they turn against Cheyenne when he tries to prove the sheriff's innocence.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E7 Hired Gun Cheyenne rides into a new town looking for work. He meets a hired gunman named Preacher in a saloon. When the town sheriff shoots and kills Preacher, Cheyenne investigates to find out why he was there in the first place.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Gunmen While in Texas, Joe and Hoss are mistaken for the Slade brothers who are involved in a feud between two families. In order to stop the fighting, they decide to turn to the women of the families for help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E1 Waste Part 1 Micah, Lucas, and Mark are lost and fear they have crossed into dangerous Mexican territory. Their fears become reality when they stumble upon a ghost town and bandits take them prisoner. When Lucas sees Micah being tortured, he must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E2 Waste Part 2 After Mexican bandits capture and hold Micah, Lucas, and Mark in a ghost town, Lucas devises a plan that will hopefully lead to freedom. Later, Lucas helps the wife of a bandit give birth, and the bandits finally release them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E3 Lou Mallory Lou Mallory, a beautiful red-headed lady, arrives in North Fork and quickly buys property, including Milly Scott's general store. Lucas learns she is quite the businesswoman, until she gets into trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E4 Quiet Night, Deadly Night A stagecoach arrives in North Fork carrying two women, one of whom is gravely ill. Doc Burrage believes it's smallpox. Lou Mallory, Lucas, and both passengers quarantine alongside with another rider, Lee Coyle, a dangerous outlaw.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E3 Lou Mallory Lou Mallory, a beautiful red-headed lady, arrives in North Fork and quickly buys property, including Milly Scott's general store. Lucas learns she is quite the businesswoman, until she gets into trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E4 Quiet Night, Deadly Night A stagecoach arrives in North Fork carrying two women, one of whom is gravely ill. Doc Burrage believes it's smallpox. Lou Mallory, Lucas, and both passengers quarantine alongside with another rider, Lee Coyle, a dangerous outlaw.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E4 Cash Cows First, the cowboys need to track down one of Bubba's most troublesome heifers before she can bust through his fence again. After briefly tending to business and family in Alabama, the guys head back to the Lone Star State to try and expand their network of contacts. Bubba, Cody, and Booger help their new friend Cash with a big Texas cattle drive in the hopes of both leading the herd to greener pastures and finding the big cattle deal they came west for. On the range they forge deeper bonds with their Texas counterparts, swapping cowboy stories around the campfire. But things take a turn for the worse when the herd overheats, and the creek they're all counting on has run dry as a bone. Back home, Jaclyn and Matthew are learning to love life on the ranch. Houseguest Andrew's disgusting habits have Kaley seeing red. And just as Misty gets back in the barrel-racing saddle, she starts to butt heads with her high-strung mare.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Loco Brothers Two renegade Indians known as the Loco Brothers kidnap Captain Wilton Parmenter from Fort Courage and hold him captive in a cave. It seems all they want is someone to talk to and be friends with. Later, the renegades join the friendly Hekawi Tribe.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E17 From Karate with Love A beautiful, young Japanese woman named Miko seeks refuge at Fort Courage, escaping from an arranged marriage. A samurai pursues her to bring her back to Japan. The F Troop faces the samurai's wrath as he will stop at nothing in his pursuit.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the slow

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E2 Jim Bridger: Forged on the Frontier With dreams of fortune and adventure, an 18-year-old Jim Bridger joins William Ashley's expedition to trap beaver along the Missouri River. But a grim ordeal soon forces Bridger to weigh his morals against the harsh reality of survival in the wild. A vicious grizzly bear attack leaves fellow trapper and hunter Hugh Glass on the verge of death and completely dependent upon Bridger's care. As a hostile band of Arikara warriors begins to close in, Bridger must choose between staying with the dying man and risking certain death, or leaving his injured comrade alone in the woods and fleeing to safety. In what becomes a legendary tale of the wild frontier, Bridger wrestles to choose between right and wrong, knowing the harsh retribution that will follow if he makes the wrong choice.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Noble Chase Jimmy teams up with his rival, Jake Colter, to hunt down Lon Chase, a bank robber with a heart of gold that has a high price on his head. Chase ultimately convinces them that he had to do it in order to stop illegal activity.

programme.title: RACER Weekly
programme.desc: How Formula 1's rules reset could mix it up in 2026.

programme.title: 2026 DAKAR Rally
programme.desc: Part race and part survival contest, just finishing is a victory in itself. Spanning 14 days and 5,000 miles, this marathon off-road event is a test of endurance that rewards precision and punishes mistakes.

programme.title: Lost Classics
programme.desc: An iconic Hurst Oldsmobile emerges from years in storage and roars back to life in the shop. Meanwhile, a cold call takes Tony to a Chevelle project that creates more questions...h it.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Host Dennis Gage upholds his "honor the timeless classics" catchphrase in this series, as he travels across North America to visit prestigious auto shows and events, spotlighting everything from muscle cars to museum pieces. The handlebar mustachioed Gage takes viewers along for the ride and keeps it entertaining with his unique perspective and enthusiasm for all things automotive.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Join master mechanic Sam Mahdavi for new projects, repairs and the best parts on the market.

programme.title: 2025 Best of GAA Classic Car Auctions

programme.desc: It's fast action in overdrive, as the In-Fisherman staff doubles down and doubles up on early season walleyes and largemouths; wades right into a small river to do hand-to-hand combat with knuckle busting channel catfish; and takes you on a trip through our archives to highlight the undeniable awesomeness and uniqueness of the many fish species we pursue.

programme.title: Catching Bass With Dustin Wilks
programme.desc: Accomplished angler Dustin Wilks fishes various bass fishing locations and teaches how to find and catch more fish. Loaded with fish catches, Catching Bass with Dustin Wilks is a show that is action packed and shows the viewer numerous techniques for catching bass. Dustin's straight forward approach coupled with his whimsical demeanor makes Catching Bass with Dustin Wilks the perfect teaching platform for anyone to be successful in bass fishing.

programme.title: Fishing With Roland Martin
programme.desc: Roland and Bobby Murray fish a 40 acre Arkansas pond that is highly managed. They use worms, frogs, and spinnerbaits for big largemouth bass.

programme.title: Fishing 411
programme.desc: Host and producer Mark Romanack shares his 30-plus years of professional fishing savvy with viewers.

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: We all have those bucket list hunts, but here we cover Melissa's top four adventures.

programme.title: Relentless Pursuit
programme.desc: Features a South Texas adventure.

programme.title: Everything Eichler
programme.desc: Fred Eichler takes viewers on thrilling bow and predator hunts, showcasing the complete field-to-table lifestyle alongside family, friends, and clients. As the host, Fred shares the daily trials of ranching, farming, and managing an outfitting business in Colorado. Expect extreme bowhunting and predator action, intertwined with the ups and downs of their authentic field-to-table journey.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground With Nick Honachefsky
programme.desc: Saltwater Underground with Nick Honachefsky explores the world's finest fishing destinations and the subculture scene of salty characters that come along with it. Each episode unfolds with a boots on the ground local mentality, experiencing the indigenous fishing opportunity at each destination but also focusing on getting in deep with the unique cuisine, local bars and humor of colorful characters, all the while weaving a solid maritime story filled with humor, personality and lifestyle.

programme.title: Julie Higgs Spearfishing
programme.desc: A lifelong spearfishing aficionado, Julie Higgs first discovered her passion while sailing aboard her family's sailboat in the Bahamas, where fish dinners caught by pole-spear were as much a tradition as a pastime. Now, armed with years of experience and an unquenchable thirst for adventure, Julie traverses the globe in pursuit of trophy fish and uncharted marine species-combining expert technique, environmental respect, and the thrill of discovery in every episode.

programme.title: In Fisherman TV
programme.desc: It's fast action in overdrive, as the In-Fisherman staff doubles down and doubles up on early season walleyes and largemouths; wades right into a small river to do hand-to-hand combat with knuckle busting channel catfish; and takes you on a trip through our archives to highlight the undeniable awesomeness and uniqueness of the many fish species we pursue.

programme.title: Jon Thelen's Destination Fish
programme.desc: It's prespawn time on the Missouri River, and Jon shows how current seams, water temperature,and precision boat control lead to big walleyes. Then, as the seasons turn, he targets aggressive fall smallmouth bass, focusing on the rocks, breaks, and bait transitions that trigger lateseason strikes.

programme.desc: It's fast and frenzied fishing action for some of North America's most prodigious sportfish, as the In-Fisherman staff takes you for mauling and brawling muskies; heads to one of North America's finest waters for giant smallmouth bass; and takes you into the Alaskan wilderness to reveal the nature of record-class northern pike, including a 54-inch monster that's the biggest pike ever captured in almost 50 years of filming In-Fisherman TV.

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Brian Pigman Quaca is a true-blue original-an unapologetic, high-energy host with a larger-than-life personality that has redefined outdoor television. With an unrelenting passion for the chase, Pigman takes on the world's toughest hunts, using any legal means necessary to put game on the ground. While his reputation was built on hardcore hog hunting, don't be mistaken-his skills extend far beyond wild pigs. From giant whitetails in the Midwest to red stag in New Zealand.

programme.title: Roger Raglin On Target
programme.desc: Roger Raglin chases big game animals all over the North American continent.

programme.title: North American Whitetail
programme.desc: With a second Illinois buck tag to fill and bow in hand, Stan Potts climbs into a stand he hung with his sons for a classic whitetail hunt that blends instinct, experience, and raw passion.

programme.title: M2D Camo's Livin' the Dream
programme.desc: Sparky, AKA THE JOKER from Jokers Wild Outdoors, takes friends, family and clients hunting all over the world and on M2D CAMO Properties for wild exciting adventures.

programme.title: Art of Wild
programme.desc: Art of wild is a film series that aims to tell stories about the wild in the most cinematic way possible. To tell the best stories we travel to the most incredible places. It is in the wild places where most won't go that the human spirit is fed. Only a hunter knows what it's like to wake up with the woods, or hear a bull bugle in the graylight, these moments are what make up the beauty of the wild.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's: The Professionals
programme.desc: Follow Jim Shockey and his crew on this first season of hunts for these huge antlered animals.

programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures: Fishing with Wesley
programme.desc: Wesley White travels to Brazil to fish for peacock bass on the Rio Negro River.

programme.title: Fishing the Midwest
programme.desc: The team reveals how and where to catch more and bigger fish including walleyes, bass and panfish.

programme.title: Catching Bass With Dustin Wilks
programme.desc: Accomplished angler Dustin Wilks fishes various bass fishing locations and teaches how to find and catch more fish. Loaded with fish catches, Catching Bass with Dustin Wilks is a show that is action packed and shows the viewer numerous techniques for catching bass. Dustin's straight forward approach coupled with his whimsical demeanor makes Catching Bass with Dustin Wilks the perfect teaching platform for anyone to be successful in bass fishing.

programme.title: Dropped: Project Origin
programme.desc: Animals are everywhere, but that doesn't mean anything is going to be easy.

programme.title: Snow Trax
programme.desc: Luke heads to Austria to join the team at Rotax for an exclusive tour and enjoy some of what Rotax and Austria has to offer.

programme.title: Hit Squad Outdoors With Tim Sylvia
programme.desc: This week we have Eddie Roberts and Dave Passon in Canada looking for big black bears.

programme.title: Trekin Outdoors
programme.desc: Uncle Steve, Chris and Tyler of Trekin Outdoors take you into the real and raw realties of everyday hunting. Chasing big game across public and private lands. Showcasing the challenges that ordianry outdoorsman face.

programme.title: Haymaker Hunting
programme.desc: Follow King Pedford, a retired professional heavyweight boxer, on hunts all over the country, inspiring and educating the next generation of hunters; King's adventures in the wild showcase the art of hunting as a true outdoor sport.

programme.title: The Gamekeepers of Mossy Oak
programme.desc: We welcome Anthony Ballard, the MDWFP Bear Coordinator, and Dr. Dana Morin, a carnivore expert from Mississippi State University, to talk about black bears in Mississippi.

programme.title: Gun Stories
programme.desc: A full auto 180, round 22 caliber machine gun is nothing but fun.

programme.title: Big Water Angler
programme.desc: Big Water Angler takes viewers on an adventurous journey across the Great Lakes region and beyond, exploring the best fishing destinations, techniques, and insider tips from seasoned captains and guides.

programme.title: Fishing With Roland Martin
programme.desc: Roland skips Salt E Sink Worms under shady docks for largemouth bass with a musky bonus.

programme.title: Julie Higgs Spearfishing
programme.desc: A lifelong spearfishing aficionado, Julie Higgs first discovered her passion while sailing aboard her family's sailboat in the Bahamas, where fish dinners caught by pole-spear were as much a tradition as a pastime. Now, armed with years of experience and an unquenchable thirst for adventure, Julie traverses the globe in pursuit of trophy fish and uncharted marine species-combining expert technique, environmental respect, and the thrill of discovery in every episode.

programme.title: This Is Africa
programme.desc: Andy Buchanan and his team embark on adrenaline-fueled hunting adventures across Africa, showcasing the continent's most sought-after trophies while delving into the crucial role of hunters in wildlife conservation. Amidst epic hunts and breathtaking scenery, they address misconceptions about hunting and highlight the collaborative efforts of local communities, governments, and hunters to protect Africa's wildlife from the threats of poaching and human-wildlife conflict.

programme.title: Weekend Recharge
programme.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which includes helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.
